snippet.textDisplay:
To everyone who says that there hasn't been a genuinely original game since the SNES era, here's what I want you to do.

1. Get a copy of Okami.
2. Play it all the way through.
3. Put the disk back in the case when you're done, and shove it up your ignorant ass as punishment for your stupidity.
snippet.textOriginal:
To everyone who says that there hasn't been a genuinely original game since the SNES era, here's what I want you to do.

1. Get a copy of Okami.
2. Play it all the way through.
3. Put the disk back in the case when you're done, and shove it up your ignorant ass as punishment for your stupidity.

Okami is awesome, wooh! I got annoyed of this theme though, but listening to the whole thing makes it sound better. I just constantly heard that beginning part which annoyed me, with the Sea monster approaching and leaving and me jumping off and back on.

Sounds like Wind Waker's "Great Ocean" though, doesn't it?
